feed.title: [ Quick 5 Star ] Coding frontend app in Bubble - Upwork
feed.description:
I am looking to get an app created in Bubble.

I want the frontend to be in Bubble, then the backend, I will use my separate Django app (so the frontend will make API calls to the Django backend)

Here is a demo of what I need the frontend to look like: https://www.loom.com/share/8d2fb5f1c73e4e6d8b62c274cb0be03a

What I need from you:
1) Please give an estimate of how long it will take
2) Your previous Bubble projects that you've built

Hourly Range: $25.00-$50.00
Posted On: January 05, 2024 17:33 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development

feed.title: Sr. full stack developer  - Upwork
feed.description:
looking for a fulltime(40hrs/wk) sr. full stack developer who has experience building enterprise data analytics software.

Our goal is to build a MVP and launch it by May 2024.

You will be working as the only developer in the team doing the followings -
- Frontend dev: MUI,React, Redux , graphQl , reactflow
(https://reactflow.dev/)
- Backend: Node, NestJS
- DB: PostgreSQL, AWS Neptune (graph DB)- Gremlin Query Language
- AWS serverless architecture- so you need to very comfortable writing lambdas, SQS etc.
- You should be able to develop and automate data pipleine in AWS
- LLM integration: You should be use lanchain and integrate various LLMs like OpenAI davinci 3.5 in micrsoft Azure, google's Gemni
- 3rd Party integration- we've already build the salesforce CRM integration and you'll need to build the Hubspot and Linkedin integration with our app.

Dev Process:
- Figma: Product/features designed in Figma by the UI/UX designer
- JIRA : user story backlog
- CICD: AWS Amplify, beanstalk, Github
- Slack/zoom - for collab
- Weekly chekin -over zoom meeting to demo/discuss the progress and prioritize task for the following week.  

Team -
1. Product manager: Myself
2. UI/UX designer
3. Sr. Developer - Yourself. You'd be replacing our current outgoing developer working in this project for last one year year.  

Other requirements:
- Looking for a sr. professional who commit, bring ideas to the table and add value to the product.
-This is a fast paced work environment, so only apply if you're agile and can comfortable working with competing priorities.

-Fixed Salary USS $4500per month deposited on last US working day of each month.
- Must work full time(40hrs/week) for our project only with undivided attention and focus.

Budget: $4,500
Posted On: December 29, 2023 20:13 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:AI App Development, JavaScript, API, API Integration, Node.js, React
Skills: AI App Development, JavaScript, API, API Integration, Node.js, React
Country: United States
click to apply

feed.title: Backend Web Developer Required - Upwork
feed.description:
We are looking for an experienced React developer who can seamlessly integrate front-end components with our Node.js backend, utilizing GraphQL for efficient data fetching and manipulation. The successful candidate will also be responsible for implementing Google Authentication to enhance user security and experience.

Key Responsibilities:

React Development:

Develop responsive and dynamic user interfaces using React.
Collaborate with the design team to implement visually appealing and intuitive user experiences.
Node.js Backend with GraphQL:

Collaborate with backend developers to integrate React components with a Node.js backend. For efficient data fetching and manipulation.

Google Authentication:
Integrate Google Authentication to enhance user security and streamline the login process.
Implement secure storage and handling of authentication tokens.

Protected Routes:
Implement protected routes to restrict access to certain parts of the application based on user authentication status.
Ensure data security by implementing proper authorization mechanisms.
Qualifications:

Proven experience as a React developer with a strong portfolio showcasing previous projects.
Experience with Node.js and GraphQL. Familiarity with authentication protocols, especially Google Authentication.
Strong understanding of front-end and back-end interactions. Ability to create clean, modular, and maintainable code.
Excellent collaboration and communication skills.
How to Apply:

If you are interested in this exciting opportunity, please submit your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience to [Your Contact Information]. We encourage applicants from diverse backgrounds to apply.

Deadline for Applications: 3 days.

We look forward to reviewing your application and discussing how your skills and experience align with our project goals.

Budget: $50
Posted On: January 05, 2024 17:45 UTC
Category: Back-End Development
Skills:GraphQL, Web Development, JavaScript, React, OAuth
Skills: GraphQL, Web Development, JavaScript, React, OAuth
Country: India
click to apply

feed.title: Full-Stack Developer - Web App - Upwork
feed.description:
-PLEASE DO NOT APPLY IF YOU'RE NOT OKAY WITH THE BUDGET-

We are looking for a talented full-stack developer to join our team and help us build a new mental health platform. This platform will provide users with a variety of resources and tools to improve their mental health and well-being.

Responsibilities:

- Develop the backend and frontend of the platform
- Implement the following features:
- User registration and login
- User profile and dashboard
- Assessments and questionnaires
- Therapy scheduling
- Chat with therapist
- Possibility for the therapist to initiate a video call after payment of the session or payment of a subscription
- Blog
- Separate dashboards for each therapist: Each therapist will have their own dashboard where they can manage their clients, schedule appointments, and access patient data.
- Secure access to patient data: Only the assigned therapist will be able to see the data of their patients. Other therapists will not have access to patient data.
- Patient confidentiality: We are committed to protecting patient confidentiality. The platform will be designed to ensure that patient data is secure and only accessible to authorized personnel.
- Dashboard specific for the admin where they can monitor website traffic, manage user accounts, and track revenue
Integration with Google Analytics to track user behavior and website performance
Integration with Facebook Pixel to track user engagement and retarget them with ads
- Patient diary where patients can take notes easily and share them with their therapist if they want to
- Therapist diary where therapists can take notes for each of their patients independently
Integrations with payment methods like Stripe, PayPal, and Tabby to allow users to purchase therapy sessions and subscriptions securely
- Deploy the platform online
- Make sure everything is working properly and that the platform is secure
- Write clean and documented code for future modifications

Qualifications:

- 3+ years of experience in full-stack development
- Strong understanding of object-oriented programming
- Experience with back-end technologies such as Java, Python, or Node.js
- Experience with front-end technologies such as React, Angular, or Vue.js
- Experience with database technologies such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB
- Experience with cloud computing platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP
- Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills
- Strong communication and collaboration skills
- English fluency is a must

Budget is fixed, not negotiable, check the full requirements and if you're okay with the budget, we'll proceed.
All the requirements are here, there's nothing much to say extra, so we don't need to have a call beforehand, we'll have a call after you're okay with budget and requirements.

TIMELINE: TBD but not more than 2.5 months

Thanks for your attention.


Budget: $300
Posted On: January 05, 2024 17:53 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:MySQL, JavaScript, Web Development, API Integration, Web Application, MERN Stack, DigitalOcean
Skills: MySQL, JavaScript, Web Development, API Integration, Web Application, MERN Stack, DigitalOcean
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

feed.title: Senior Frontend ReactJS Developer - Upwork
feed.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Frontend ReactJS Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in building scalable, high-quality, and high-performance enterprise-grade applications using a pure component-based approach with ReactJS. Your primary focus will be developing user interface components and implementing them following well-known ReactJS workflows, ensuring that these components and the overall application are robust and easy to maintain.

Key Responsibilities:

Component Development: Develop and maintain high-quality, reusable, and reliable ReactJS components. You should be proficient in building both functional and class components with a keen understanding of the entire web development process (design, development, and deployment).

Performance Optimization: Optimize components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers. Implement performance testing frameworks to ensure the application can handle the required load.

Code Quality: Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code. Ensure code follows best practices and industry standards, with a focus on security and scalability.

Collaboration: Work closely with the design and other dev team to translate visual concepts into functional online experiences. Collaborate with backend developers and other team members to establish objectives and design more functional, cohesive codes to enhance user experience.

Testing and Debugging: Develop and implement robust testing solutions and debugging routines to ensure the application's stability and performance.

Documentation: Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for your code, solutions, and component libraries, ensuring that future maintenance is efficient and scalable.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$30.00
Posted On: January 05, 2024 17:57 UTC
Category: Front-End Development
Skills:React, JavaScript, CSS, Redux, HTML, CSS 3, HTML5
Skills: React, JavaScript, CSS, Redux, HTML, CSS 3, HTML5
Country: United States
click to apply

feed.title: Introduction to Kotlin with an existing exercise - Upwork
feed.description:
I am a QA trying to transition from Java to Kotlin.
I have a study project that I cannot complete on my own and would like someone highly experienced in adding Unit Tests and Cucumber Tests to an existing Kotlin project.

Desirable: If you can write a Python wrapper to execute the tests
Desirable: If you can implement GitHub Actions to run the python wrappers in some simple CI/CD

I will later need a lot of help with Kotlin. So, this is potentially a long term engagement

Hourly Range: $30.00-$50.00

feed.title: Dev Ops  - Upwork
feed.description:
creating backend APIs and request validations and AWS sam deployment in lambda for 4 pages.

- Limiting the number of accounts that can be created in live if necessary.

- pointing api gateway URL to website.

- pointing cloudfront url to website.

- AWS KMS Key creation for production to encrypt database.

- Making sure all of our services are under a VPC.

- sam template modification.

    - Removing CORS for all the services in production.

- Adding Rate limiting checks in API gateway for all the sensitive ones like generate OTPs.

- Changing gateway url stage.

- Set proper cache timeout value in gateway.

- Mongodb

- cluster creation

- setting up auditing

- setting up triggers if any.

- Adding plans data and anyother config to corresponding collections.

- all the necessary index creation.

- not required.

- Running users collection creation scripts for users collection in production.

- add a secure network peering connection to mongodb from AWS.

- adding different access level roles to different services for mongodb restricting

  their access only to the collections that are actually required by them.

- Removing the password protection from website.

- Going through all the environment variables, secrets, third party keys and changing/rotating them

  to live values.

- Google

- Restricting access to maps API key only to our website and app.

- Admin panel service

- Deployment to AWS

- Changing the database connection url

- Adding admin panel instance to VPC

- Plaid

- Set network risk to medium level.

- Verify and move templates from sandbox to production.

- Stripe

- Change env to live keys.

- configure a webhook endpoint in the dashboard in live.

- Check all the steps in https://stripe.com/docs/development/checklist

- Check and verify we've added all the events in the webhook which we're listening

  for in the code.

- Cloudwatch

- Make sure the logs are configured to all the functions.

- Configure any error metrics and alerts.

- add www to website.

- Any other unknown deployment steps/issues.

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: January 05, 2024 18:24 UTC
Category: DevOps Engineering
Skills:Google Cloud Platform, CI/CD, DevOps, Deployment Automation, Docker, Amazon Web Services, Application Release Automation, AWS Lambda, Amazon API Gateway, MongoDB Ops Manager
Skills: Google Cloud Platform, CI/CD, DevOps, Deployment Automation, Docker, Amazon Web Services, Application Release Automation, AWS Lambda, Amazon API Gateway, MongoDB Ops Manager
Country: United States
click to apply

feed.title: Backend Go Developer - Upwork
feed.description:
Are you someone who has a passion for coding advanced backend solutions? We're on the lookout for a talented Go Developer to join our team! If you thrive in a collaborative environment and love new and exciting coding challenges, this might just be the job for you.

Qualifications:
Solid Go development experience with a portfolio showcasing your skills.
Proficient in backend architecture and RESTful API design.
Strong problem-solving skills with a track record of addressing complex technical challenges.
Experience with databases, caches, message queues, and other similar services
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Familiarity with WebRTC and Pion would be a big bonus as we work with media
Demonstrated ability to be self-sufficient and take ownership of projects.
Able to work hours with colleagues on east coast USA hours.

Applicants will be asked to perform a coding exercise for our review as well as interview with engineers from our team.  If you're ready to take your Go development skills to the next level and be part of a forward-thinking team, apply and tell us why you're the Go Developer we've been searching for.


Hourly Range: $20.00-$30.00

Skills: Golang, RESTful API, Software Architecture & Design

In the role of “Shopify Website specialist”, you will provide our partners with a Shopify website in collaboration with us. This means creating the whole backend infrastructure, filling the template etc.

feed.title: Backend/Frontend Developer - Upwork
feed.description:
--Time frame are 10 Days--

**Task 1: Deposit Feature Enhancement**
- Implement a random amount generation after the decimal point for deposit amounts.

**Task 2: Favorite Numbers Section Enhancement**
- Create a "Favorite Numbers" section where players can generate and save preferred numbers for lottery plays.

**Task 3: VIP Bonus Count Enhancement**
- Add a "VIP Bonus Chart" on the user homepage that displays rewards based on the number of games played.

**Task 4: Thai Government Lottery Integration**
- Automatically update lottery outcomes from the government's official homepage for the Thai government lottery section.
- Calculate customer winnings based on the amount they invest in purchasing lottery numbers for bi-monthly draws.

**Task 5: Yikki Lottery Integration**
- Integrate the Yikki Lottery, including the Regular Player Room and VIP Player Room.
- Allow players to participate in all 88 daily draws in both rooms.
- Enable players to choose the quantity and pricing of their selected numbers, with different starting amounts for each game.

**Task 6: Website Sections Overview**
- Review the existing website, including the landing page area, user login, and admin section.
- Ensure that all functions remain easily accessible and manageable from the admin section.

**Task 7: SMS Verification Implementation**
- Implement SMS verification and notifications for customers/players.
- Set up an SMS module on the website to enhance security.


Budget: $300
Posted On: January 05, 2024 18:42 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:JavaScript, HTML5, PHP, React, CSS 3, Web Application
Skills: JavaScript, HTML5, PHP, React, CSS 3, Web Application
click to apply

feed.description:
e are seeking an experienced website developer to create a business website that will represent our brand. The ideal candidate should have 3+ years of experience in web development, with expertise in building websites using Wix and WordPress platforms.

The project should not take longer than a couple of days, and the candidate should be available to start immediately. The website will need to be user-friendly, visually appealing, and optimized for search engines. The developer should have strong communication skills and be able to work collaboratively with our team to ensure that the website meets our business needs.
We need an expert we can consult with as well as rely on.

We are indeed of a team member, who handles the entire side of website creation and maintenance for us.

feed.title: Looking for Python and Java Script developers to do 3 hours tutorial videos for each topic - Upwork
feed.description:
We are currently seeking skilled Python and JavaScript developers capable of creating high-quality tutorial videos for a duration of 3 hours each. These videos will comprehensively cover Python and JavaScript development projects, providing in-depth insights into the intricacies of the programming languages. Proficiency in Python, JavaScript, and the ability to convey complex concepts to a general audience are essential qualifications.

Qualified candidates should be experienced developers with a solid foundation in Python and JavaScript, possess fluency in English, and have the skills to produce top-notch educational content. The creation of effective tutorial videos will require screen capture expertise, and access to a good-quality microphone is mandatory.

Compensation for each tutorial video is fixed at $40. Please be aware that we will retain the rights to use these videos on our social media platforms, and candidates are not allowed to use, share, or distribute the videos for personal or other projects.

To be considered for this opportunity, please submit a resume along with a sample video. Failure to provide both will result in exclusion from further evaluation.

Budget: $40
Posted On: January 05, 2024 19:03 UTC
Category: Back-End Development
Skills:Python, JavaScript
Skills: Python, JavaScript
click to apply

feed.title: Senior Rust Developer - Smart Contract - Upwork
feed.description:
Job Summary:
Seeking a Senior Rust Developer with specialized experience in smart contract development. The role requires advanced technical expertise in blockchain technologies, Rust programming, and smart contract architecture to develop and optimize decentralized applications.

Responsibilities:
Develop, test, and deploy smart contracts using Rust.
Optimize smart contract performance, security, and scalability.
Implement blockchain protocols and integrate them with various applications.
Maintain up-to-date knowledge of blockchain technology trends and Rust updates.
Diagnose and resolve complex technical issues related to smart contracts.

Required Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.
2+ years of experience in software development with extensive use of Rust.
Proven track record in smart contract development and deployment.
In-depth understanding of blockchain technology, cryptographic protocols, and consensus algorithms.
Expertise in writing high-quality, well-tested code.

Technical Skills:
Advanced Rust programming skills.
Experience with blockchain platforms like Ethereum, Solana, or similar.
Knowledge of DApps architecture and decentralized systems.
Proficiency in algorithm optimization and systems security.
Experience in performance tuning and scalability enhancement.
Additional Notes:

Experience in traditional gaming development or blockchain-based gaming is considered a plus.
Familiarity with Solana development is beneficial.



Posted On: January 05, 2024 20:10 UTC
Category: Back-End Development
Skills:Database, Database Architecture, C#, NGINX, Apache HTTP Server, Rust, API, Software Architecture & Design, C++
Skills: Database, Database Architecture, C#, NGINX, Apache HTTP Server, Rust, API, Software Architecture & Design, C++

In de rol van "Shopify-website specialist" voorzie je onze partners van een Shopify-website in samenwerking met ons. Dit betekent het creëren van de volledige backend-infrastructuur, het /zoeken invullen van de template, enzovoort.

Als je geïnteresseerd bent in deze functie, volg dan de instructies in de video om je aan te melden. We kijken uit naar de mogelijkheid om samen te werken.

feed.title: Blockchain Frontend Developer  - Upwork
feed.description:
We are seeking experienced and talented Blockchain Frontend Developers to join our team and contribute to the creation of a cutting-edge blockchain platform based on XRPL.org's open-source code. As a Blockchain Frontend Developer, you will play a crucial role in designing and implementing the user interface for our blockchain application. Your responsibilities will include:

1. Collaborate with the development team to understand requirements and contribute to the overall architecture of the blockchain frontend.
2. Develop intuitive and responsive user interfaces that provide seamless interactions with the blockchain platform.
3. Implement design mockups and wireframes to ensure a visually appealing and user-friendly experience.
4. Integrate frontend components with backend blockchain functionalities, ensuring efficient data flow and system performance.
5. Stay updated on the latest trends and best practices in blockchain and frontend development to enhance the platform's features and user experience.
6. Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to the frontend implementation, collaborating with the broader development team.
7. Conduct code reviews to ensure code quality, maintainability, and adherence to coding standards.

**Requirements:**
1. Proven experience as a Frontend Developer with a focus on blockchain technologies.
2. Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, along with experience using modern frontend frameworks such as React or Next. js.
3. Familiarity with blockchain concepts and protocols, especially XRPL.org's open-source blockchain code.
4. Strong understanding of user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design principles.
5. Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and communicate effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
6. Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git) and agile development methodologies.

If you are passionate about blockchain technology and have the skills to contribute to the development of a groundbreaking blockchain platform, we want to hear from you.

**Note:** Include any specific details about the project, company, or additional qualifications based on your unique requirements.


Posted On: January 05, 2024 20:22 UTC
Category: Front-End Development
Skills:React, Next.js
Skills: React, Next.js
Country: Bahamas
click to apply

feed.title: Need 30-60 min IT consultation for web application - Full Stack - Upwork
feed.description:
We are looking to create a software discovery and review website like G2.com or trustradius.com. We are looking for consultation on tech stack and technical architecture suggestions. Would welcome suggestions on something readily available platforms or tools like Algolia, Elastic, Disqus, etc.

The application will serve as an unbiased discovery and review platform for users researching software options by aggregating listings and verified reviews. Key Features include:

• Intuitive UI and UX for searching, browsing, and reviewing software.
• Directory of business software with filters, comparisons, taxonomy-based categories
• User profiles, and company pages for software vendors to showcase solutions
• Review system for users to rate and review software based on experience, etc.

Category: Full Stack Development
